projectDescription: PGA Golf Pool is a web application that allows users to create and manage a pool of golfers. The application allows users to create a pool of golfers, add golfers to the pool, and remove golfers from the pool. The application also allows users to view the pool and the statistics of the pool.
techStack: HTML, CSS, React-Bootstrap, JavaScript, React Hooks, React-Router, Axios, PHP, Laravel

projectDescription: Using State, creating application to render Mindreader game which makes user select a number to magically show correct results.
Pulling information from an API to populate a Menu Page
techStack: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, React, Axios

projectDescription: Log-In Application for Cat Steve's fishing store. Application takes user information from an API to be able to log into and out of an app as a password-protected user using Local Storage.  Completed stretch goal to combine project will fellow bootcampers.
techStack: HTML, CSS, React-Bootstrap, JavaScript, React Hooks, React-Router, Axios

projectDescription: Application lets user play traditional Tic-Tac-Toe and continue until a win/tie scenario is reached.
